publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1053 Dr Jean Turner: Financial Implications of the New Consultant Contract-That the Parliament recognises the increased financial implications of the new consultants' contract; believes that there is also the requirement for consultants to work additional hours in order to cover patient need and the training of junior doctors which is required by the Royal Colleges, and calls upon NHS boards and trusts to ensure that these additional hours are not removed in order to prevent closure of much-needed services purely to meet financial restraints.

S2M-1053 Financial Implications of the New Consultant Contract (lodged on 17 March 2004) Carolyn Leckie*, Phil Gallie*, Mr David Davidson*, Richard Lochhead*, Bruce Crawford*, Margaret Mitchell*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Ms Sandra White*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Margo MacDonald*
